@@ -156,9 +253,28 @@
      * <p/>
      * You should not mix {@link #createTailer} and {@code subscribe} usage using the same {@code group}.
      */

+    <M extends Externalizable> LogTailer<M> subscribe(Name group, Collection<Name> names,
             RebalanceListener listener, Codec<M> codec);
 
+    /**

+     */
+    @Deprecated
+    default <M extends Externalizable> LogTailer<M> subscribe(String group, Collection<String> names,
+            RebalanceListener listener, Codec<M> codec) {
+        return subscribe(Name.ofUrn(group), names.stream().map(Name::ofUrn).collect(Collectors.toList()), listener,
+                codec);
+    }

timeline.message:
NXP-29077: fix testFileBlobAndDocumentImport nb of blobs

On slow Kafka cluster read may return an empty record because assignement
is not yet done within the 100ms which create a doc with an empty blob
NXP-28963: Temporarily ignore (more) tests randomly failing in Jenkins X
NXP-28801: Computation context is aware of spare state

NXP-28801: Add a processor to report Nuxeo Stream Metrics

A single thread in the Nuxeo cluster is reporting the global nuxeo
stream metrics.
Nuxeo stream metrics have been renamed to use tags and global suffix.
Latency is reported only for consumer that lags.
Use the proper synchronization when retrieving the lags.
NXP-28877: Use Name object for stream and consumer group
NXP-28877: Adapt stream importer to LogManager Name object
NXP-28879: Add UnifiedLogManager that can handle multiple configuration
NXP-28879: Use the UnifiedLogManager in nuxeo-runtime-stream

NXP-28879: Rename all streams and consumer groups

Action names are not changed to not break existing code or REST API,
the action's input stream can now be set explicitly in the XP.

NXP-29077: fix testFileBlobAndDocumentImport nb of blobs

On slow Kafka cluster read may return an empty record because assignement
is not yet done within the 100ms which create a doc with an empty blob
NXP-28801: Udpate api doc contribs

NXP-28879: LogConfig may be used jsut to initialize log

When not defining a name and a type only take care of the log initialization.
NXP-28879 NXP-28619: Make nuxeo.test.stream=kafka work
NXP-28879: Rely on runtime for CQ/Kafka switch on stream importer
NXP-28619: Allow to assume Kafka enablement in runtime stream tests
NXP-28619: Only ignore tests ignored for NXP-27559 when run against Chronicle
NXP-28619: Define conditional ignore for Kafka and Chronicle
NXP-28619: Refactor unit test chart values/system properties generation
NXP-28619: Run runtime unit tests with Kafka

NXP-28619: Increase log tailer read timeout in TestLog

This fixes TestLogKafka.testListConsumerGroups failing with:
```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.nuxeo.lib.stream.tests.log.TestLog.readKey(TestLog.java:938)
	at org.nuxeo.lib.stream.tests.log.TestLog.testListConsumerGroups(TestLog.java:714)
```

NXP-28619: Fix Kafka configuration for unit tests

Set group.initial.rebalance.delay.ms = 10

The default value in the Kafka Helm chart, 3 seconds, is good for production because it allows to group the rebalancing when starting several nodes.
Yet, for the unit tests, it wastes some time since we are only starting/stopping consumers.

Set offsets.topic.num.partitions = 5

Default value is 50.
Reducing the number of partitions of the __consumer_offset internal topic will relieve disk IO and save some time, including for the initial rebalancing.
NXP-28619: Make tests independent from Kafka configuration (group.initial.rebalance.delay.ms)
NXP-28619: Run MongoDB/PostgreSQL unit tests with Kafka
NXP-28619: Refactor K8s rollout status statements
NXP-28619: Fix possible random on slow slave
NXP-28619: Prevent failure while commit position of the last batch
NXP-28957: Fix randomly failing TestCommentsMigrator.testMigrationFromPropertyToSecuredWithCommentParentEmpty

NXP-29047: Enable to delete Kafka topic, applied to UT

Disabling Kafka auto create topic mode.
Use a random prefix per run to avoid multiple initialization
when using @Deploy annotation on method.

NXP-28619: Fix serializer/deserializer class resolution

Avoid doing class resolution within Kafka because of its weird class loader
that sometime produce Class not found.
NXP-28619: Temporary commit for debug purpose to be removed
NXP-29047: Stop processing before deleting topics in unit test
NXP-28973: Deletion action handle document under retention

NXP-28619: Test mvn options

Disabling profiling optimisation -XX:TieredStopAtLevel=1 to use less
resources
Try to run to use parallelism with 4 threads when possible -T4C
Note that concurrency must be disabled on Package phase.
NXP-28728: Avoid SWM race condition with the KV Store
NXP-28619: Try to lower retention and transaction state options
NXP-29044: Trace more information in case of CommitFailedException
NXP-29045: Upgrade to Kafka 2.5.0
NXP-29045: Support new Kafka rebalance onPartitionsLost listener
NXP-29044: Temporarly change log level from WARN to INFO

NXP-29044: Fix commitFailedException during rebalancing

Raise a RebalanceException if poll returns in the middle of
a rebalancing, this prevent to call commit and raise the
CommitFailedException or RebalanceInProgressException (2.5.0)

NXP-28619: Output pod description in build logs

We're particularly interested in the node name to be able to monitor its resource consumption afterwards.
NXP-28619: Use maven enforcer only on Package phase

NXP-29077: fix testFileBlobAndDocumentImport nb of blobs

On slow Kafka cluster read may return an empty record because assignement
is not yet done within the 100ms which create a doc with an empty blob
NXP-28877 NXP-28879 NXP-29047: Take into account reviews
NXP-28619: Bump rollout timeouts
NXP-28619: Bump rollout timeouts
